item.title: Michael Burry’s latest AI criticism is on depreciation. What it’s all about.
item.description: Michael Burry, the hedge-fund manager of “The Big Short” fame who is betting against two of the stock market’s favorite AI plays, is back with a new c...

item.title: ‘I’m in a financial mess’: My income was cut in half. Do I sell my $600K home and kiss my 2.9% mortgage rate goodbye?
item.description: “We can move 10 miles south, where property is much cheaper.”

item.title: The government shutdown looks on track to end this week. A House vote is the remaining hurdle.
item.description: The record-setting government shutdown appears on course to conclude in a matter of days.

item.title: I’m 83 and will have $500K if I sell my house. My estranged wife wants me to join her in Colombia. Do I go?
item.description: “I can just barely handle my expenses with a mortgage payment of $984 and an income of $3,800.”

item.title: I’m in my 50s and divorced with a $1.7 million home. I fell in love with an old school friend. Does it make financial sense to marry?
item.description: “I have a $500,000 Roth IRA, a portfolio account of $500,000 and $300,000 in 529 plans.”
